text: "Measure for Measure" is the fourth studio album by Australian new wave band Icehouse. It was released on 21 April 1986 through Chrysalis Records. It went to number 2 in New Zealand and number 8 in Australia. It also reached number 55 in the United States. ==Track listing== All songs written by Iva Davies and Robert Kretschmer, except where noted. == References == Category:1986 albums Category:Icehouse (band)
title: Measure for Measure (album)
